languages.text: {n}Драйвстем бросает на вас восхищенный взгляд. Похоже, он наслышан о вашей персоне, и возможность угодить {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}знаменитости{/d} радует его сердце.{/n}

{n}Drivestem gives you a look of admiration. It seems that he is quite aware of your fame, and this opportunity to curry favour with such an {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}eminent figure{/d} is one he does not wish to miss.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Драйвстем бросает на вас восхищенный взгляд. Похоже, он наслышан о вашей персоне, и возможность угодить {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}знаменитости{/d} радует его сердце.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Drivestem gives you a look of admiration. It seems that he is quite aware of your fame, and this opportunity to please such an eminent figure is one that he does not wish to miss.{/n}
{n}Drivestem gives you a look of admiration. It seems that he is quite aware of your fame, and this opportunity to please such an eminent figure is one that he does not wish to miss.{/n}
{n}Drivestem gives you a look of admiration. It seems that he is quite aware of your fame, and this opportunity to curry favour with such an eminent figure is one he does not wish to miss.{/n}

{n}Drivestem gives you a look of admiration. It seems that he is quite aware of your fame, and this opportunity to curry favour with such an eminent figure is one he does not wish to miss.{/n}

languages.text: {n}德莱夫斯塔对你露出了赞许的表情。看得出来，他对你的名声早有耳闻。他不愿错过这个机会，讨好你这位{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}杰出的人物{/d}。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Drivestem gives you a look of admiration. It seems that he is quite aware of your fame, and this opportunity to curry favour with such an {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}eminent figure{/d} is one he does not wish to miss.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}德莱夫斯塔对你露出了赞许的表情。看得出来，他对你的名声早有耳闻。他不愿错过这个机会，讨好你这位杰出的人物。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Drivestem blickt dich bewundernd an. Er weiß offenbar von deinem Ruhm und will sich diese Gelegenheit nicht entgehen lassen, die Gunst einer so {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}herausragenden Persönlichkeit{/d} zu gewinnen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Drivestem gives you a look of admiration. It seems that he is quite aware of your fame, and this opportunity to curry favour with such an {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}eminent figure{/d} is one he does not wish to miss.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Drivestem blickt dich bewundernd an. Er weiß offenbar von deinem Ruhm und will sich diese Gelegenheit nicht entgehen lassen, die Gunst einer solch herausragenden Person zu gewinnen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Drivestem vous regarde avec admiration. Il semble déjà au fait de votre renommée et n'a visiblement pas l'intention de laisser passer cette chance de s'attirer les bonnes grâces d'une {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}personne de votre stature{/d}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Drivestem gives you a look of admiration. It seems that he is quite aware of your fame, and this opportunity to curry favour with such an {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}eminent figure{/d} is one he does not wish to miss.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Drivestem vous regarde avec admiration. Il semble déjà au fait de votre renommée et n'a visiblement pas l'intention de laisser passer cette chance de s'attirer les bonnes grâces d'une personne de votre stature.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Drivestem te lanza una mirada de admiración. Parece que es plenamente consciente de tu fama y no quiere dejar pasar la ocasión de ganarse el favor de alguien tan {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}eminente{/d}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Drivestem gives you a look of admiration. It seems that he is quite aware of your fame, and this opportunity to curry favour with such an {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}eminent figure{/d} is one he does not wish to miss.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Drivestem te lanza una mirada de admiración. Parece que es plenamente consciente de tu fama y no quiere dejar pasar la ocasión de ganarse el favor de alguien tan eminente.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ドライブステムは感嘆の表情を浮かべる。彼はあなたの名声をよく知っているようで、このような{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}著名人{/d}の機嫌を取る機会を逃したくないらしい。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Drivestem gives you a look of admiration. It seems that he is quite aware of your fame, and this opportunity to curry favour with such an {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}eminent figure{/d} is one he does not wish to miss.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ドライブステムは感嘆の表情を浮かべる。彼はあなたの名声をよく知っているようで、このような{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}著名人{/d}の機嫌を取る機会を逃したくないらしい。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Drivestem sana hayranlık dolu bir bakış atıyor. Görünüşe göre namının gayet farkında ve böylesi {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}ünlü birisiyle{/d} iyi ilişkiler kurma fırsatını kaçırmak istemiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Drivestem gives you a look of admiration. It seems that he is quite aware of your fame, and this opportunity to curry favour with such an {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}eminent figure{/d} is one he does not wish to miss.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Drivestem sana hayranlık dolu bir bakış atıyor. Görünüşe göre sahip olduğun namın gayet farkında ve böylesi ünlü bir şahısla iyi ilişkiler geliştirme fırsatını kaçırmak istemiyor.{/n}
